LanguageData.Faunapedia.UnlockedByDefaultDesc: If enabled, animals in the faunapedia are unlocked by default, they do not have to have been seen or tamed to be inspected.
LanguageData.Faunapedia.UnlockedBySightingDesc: If enabled, animals are unlocked in the faunapedia as they as seen, which means just being on any map loaded. Unlocked by Default overrides this option if active.
LanguageData.Faunapedia.UnlockedByTamingDesc: If enabled, animals are unlocked in the faunapedia when tamed, the previous two options override this if they either are active.
LanguageData.Faunapedia.UnknownShownDesc: If enabled, shows a question mark with the name of unknown animals in the faunapedia, so you can see which ones you have not seen/tamed. If disabled hides them completely and only lists known animals.
LanguageData.Faunapedia.HideLabelsDesc: If enables, hides the labels in the Faunapedia for better visibility, you can still see the name of an animal by hovering over it and a tooltip will show instead.
LanguageData.Faunapedia.UnknownSilhouettesDesc: If enabled, shows silhouettes for unknown animals, if disabled shows a question mark.
